website_summaries.verdict: A highly functional coffee table that includes a pull out hidden storage top. Well-built with a  timeless oak finish.
pros: This striking coffee table has a very functional design
Lift the top of the table to create a multi-purpose work surface
The storage included within the top section is a great addition
cons: Some users have trouble assembling this table

customer_reviews.title: Okay with one big caveat
customer_reviews.text: I’d give this a 3 Star. The product looks great, the lift top mechanism works fantastic even with a bunch of weight on it. However the bottom and shelf of the unit as it attaches to either side/legs is junk. Once you put it down somewhere don’t move it! Usually when using cam locks one side screws into a hole and the otherside goes into the cam then gets tight when the cam is turned. In this case the screw assembly just slides in and out of the hole. It’s completely lose. So if you try and move the table the sides will separate from bottom. I don’t see this lasting longer than 6mo to a year.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Works great for homework and eating dinner casually
customer_reviews.text: Took a few hours to put together. No man help! Institutions are simple to follow-the pictures help. I've posted a picture of it closed and open. Works great for homework and eating dinner casually. I have small children so I'm concerned about the pointy corners, but haven't had an incident yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this item
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this item! Took me about 3 hours to put it together alone. The instructions were very easy to follow. I was pleasantly surprised by how sturdy and heavy the table is. In all it is everything I hoped for. Also the shipping was very fast. I ended up getting the table 2or 3 days earlier then my estimated delivery date.
customer_reviews.author: latasha whitelow

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful and matches my floor. It took me with limited skills about 3 hours to assemble. I bought two bookcases, a table, and entertainment stand to match, also Sauder.
customer_reviews.author: Mana

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, just wished lift top came up a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, just wished lift top came up a little higher. I'm 6'4" and it doesn't clear my knees like my last lift top table did. However, it does look great and I knew the measurements would be close but was hoping for just a couple more inches. (insert joke here)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: This coffee table looks exactly as pictured. This took two of us about 3.5 hours (on & off) to put together. The directions could've been a little clearer as we had two mix-ups. However, I appreciate some humorous notes throughout the directions. This is not a real wood coffee table, it is compressed cardboard, for $150 this is a nice coffee table. Other reviews comment on its "lack of quality" for this price point its a great table - not sure what other purchasers were expecting? I found this to be a steardy table. My only concern it looks like it can be scratched easily, hope the quality holds.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This thing has fallen apart on us 5 times. If it wasn’t for the fact that I can fix or make anything this thin would have been in the dumpster within a month. It’s not like we overuse or abuse it, we pull it to us to eat dinners in the living room, that’s it, and 3 legs have detached because of it. I have it on sliders, there’s no pressure on the legs! As it stands I have had to reconstruct parts of it and will probably just remake it and use this crap thing for parts. Don’t buy this,
customer_reviews.author: Kat Smith

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, but after having it set up for about an hour it already cracked
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Expensive particle board didnt last a month
customer_reviews.text: +Very nice looking, fairly easy to assemble, easy to read and follow instructions. -particle board with a coating. * UPDATE: 12/23/18. 6:18PM TOTAL GARBAGE, My wife just moved it slightly to vacuum getting the house ready for company and the entire bottom falls off the table, guess your particle board isnt time tested. I either need a new table or my money back. I'll be in contact after the holiday. Table is less than a month old and anchors tore right out of the particle board. Even tho they put "oak" in the title so people who dont know woodworking think it's a nice table.
customer_reviews.author: Big Frost Gaming

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart as soon as you touch it
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this coffee table. I have put together tons of furniture and the quality of this piece is just not there. The screws do not stay tight and the second you touch it or move it the thing falls apart. The lid is made to open and just the slight shift of opening and closing it must be enough for the screws to loosen so sometimes the legs kick out and the bottom falls. A total waste of our time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Z.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, and unrepairable
customer_reviews.text: I love this set, as it provided storage and functionality that my family of four appreciate (kids ages 10 and 12). I also love the apperance. However, this thing was falling apart within the first year of ownership. Two of the four legs have broken, and one of the brackets for the lift top have broke. I have tried to repair using brackets and additional screws, but the pressed lumber falls apart so easily. I also bought two end tables from the same Dakota set, and they have BOTH also begun falling apart. After this experience, I would not buy Sauder again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plywood material
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to order this coffee table since I am in my first apartment alone and wanted to have nice "grown up" furnature. Upon recieving this piece, it was chipped in a few places which didn't bother me. But as I started to put the piece together, it started to crack and pieces began to break off. It took me about 3 hours before I finally gave up and threw the thing away. Huge waste of money. If this were of a bit higher quality, it would be an amazing piece. Straightforward direction and good design but cheap material.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: pretty...flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I have lots of experience assembling furniture and everything else i've ever built is still standing. This table began to fall apart within the first month. to the point legs would randomly fall off. Tried to fix it up with some supporting screws, because after all this is an almost $200 table. Hell I even tried wood glue, i was at a loss i mean You would expect it to hold, up. I have a 30 year old thrift store coffee table that we are now using. cause this p.o.s. is now out in the burn pile. Dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: qzwxecynum

customer_reviews.title: Want my money back
customer_reviews.text: Used for less than 2 week and the below part fall apart even if I nailed the bottom part to make it stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Gyanadeep sahoo

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: This table is very cheaply made. After having this for 9 months and being used very little the whole thing is starting to collapse. Everything is put together correctly It just seems that the body can not withstand the weight of the top. Every time you open the lid the shelves and legs fall out from under it. Again this has been assembled multiple times and the same thing happens so this is not from being put together incorrectly. Don’t buy this it’s a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Great strong table
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it's a pretty good table. Springs are really strong. So it'll kind of snap up a little. Biggest problem I'd say with the table is the middle bar. On the inside it gets in the way so you can't store too much taller stuff. It would have been better design if it got put in the back behind the hinges And the instructions were a little confusing in a couple areas It's definitely sturdy. The last one I tried to get from a different company was really wobbly trying to open it But this one Is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Heavier than we expected (which is a good thing) was very easy to put together. It is a little easier to put together if you have a second person to help. Took my fiance and I maybe a half hour to get it out together. So far we love it. He's obsessed with how the fake scratches in the wood look so real.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Keebals

customer_reviews.title: Cheap construction, didn’t last 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: After having used it 4 months it broke. Poor quality. The thing quite literally fell apart when I pushed it (gently) while cleaning. Wouldn’t recommend. Don’t bother buying this unless you like cheap furniture.
customer_reviews.author: nahara r pacheco

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the quality of the wood that came with this. The instructions are fairly straight forward, but expect a couple hours to put this together. I normally would have used a drill on a lot of the screws, but chose to do it all by hand so as to not strip any screws. I chose this by looking at the weight of the product, figuring I would get the best quality by choosing the heaviest weight shipping. It is heavy at 65 pounds, and great quality. I won't worry about sending this back and I'm expecting years of trouble free use.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: You need more metal brackets for the bottom legs.
customer_reviews.text: Moderately sturdy assuming you do not move the coffee table, and you do not put heavy weight on it. If you move table the bottom shelf will break and come out (see the image). Such damage happens because there's a design flaw. No brackets or screws to firmly attach the legs at the bottom half. To fix this, you need additional metal brackets (4G) for each of the bottom legs (see the video). It needs a minimum of 2 people to assemble without breaking the parts. After assembling it once, do not attempt disassembling it as it will damage the wood permanently. Do not think of moving it.
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: Watch your knees!
customer_reviews.text: The color is like dark coffee with a few lighter spots to make it look weathered. It’s heavy, so make sure you have two people to lift. I love the lift top, but that’s the only way to access the storage inside. And you can store anything near the springs or else it will not close. There are two cubbies at the bottom that you could fit baskets in for storage as well. The corners are sharp so if you bump your knee on it in the middle of the night when you go to get a snack, it’s gonna hurt. May not be great if you have a child just starting to walk.
customer_reviews.author: TheMadBaker

customer_reviews.title: Completely Fell Apart
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this back in May and since then it has completely fallen apart. At first, the bottom shelf fell out when I opened and closed the lid. Now, the legs keep loosening and threatening to come unattached. Any time you touch it it wobbles precariously and you have to constantly push the legs back in. This was a bit more expensive than I wanted to spend on a coffee table but I figured it would at least be made well and that could not be further from the truth. I've gotten better quality coffee tables from Walmart for less than $50.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa L.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, can add casters too!
customer_reviews.text: So first off I added casters (wheels) because I have a recliner couch and it’s PERFECT height to eat over. I love the look it’s beachy and natural also very sturdy and good sized. I am 30 male and pretty fit, this thing has a lot of easy steps during construction but a couple that were DIFFICULT! However I was able to assemble by myself in about 2.5 hours. Overall great buy for the price, highly recommend. Super smooth open and close of the lift top and everything on top stays stable during movements. Great buy, very pleased. ADD CASTERS! It’s fun and way easier to slide to where you wanna eat! Hope this was helpful, Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Brunner

customer_reviews.title: Edges...
customer_reviews.text: Some of the reviews stated that the table has sharp corners which is true and on the second day I actually cut my leg. Well, all of the edges are too sharp for comfort. You cannot even rest your feet on the table because the edges are sharp and cut into the backs of your legs/calves. The table was easy to assemble (about an hour), the look is good and the opening and raising table top is good for eating but again the edges are all to sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is as cheap as you can go , very thin wood , top is thin as well , slams when you close it , can only put flat things in it as everything hits ! Save up for something a little better , looks cheap
customer_reviews.author: Diana brickey

customer_reviews.title: For The Price - It Can't Be Beaten
customer_reviews.text: From experience, I wear a face mask so as not to breath in the particle dust that, in the past, has given me a nose infection. Putting the table together took two gentle hours, I wasn't in a rush. The directions were pretty simple to follow and I built it without help. Once assembled it's sturdy and took the weight of me sitting on it to put on my shoes. It doubles as my desk and keeps all my supplies out of sight. Most of all, unless you know what to look for it doesn't look like the lid lifts up. Nice job.
customer_reviews.author: Mine Your Own

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal, Sturdy and Storage!
customer_reviews.text: This is like my work desk while sitting on a sofa. Plenty storage and sturdy business feel. The cutest small screwdriver came in the tools kit, its adorable. Initially I was intimidated by the assembly but managed single handedly, by leaning the table on the sofa for the final part (when two hands are needed). Enjoyed the assembly. Plz follow the diagrams to make sure you are aligning it all right. Must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Rachna Chopra

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table about 6 months ago and I’m writing a review now because everything was fine until I tried to scoot the table to one side of my living room for painting. The bottom section popped out, and all- I mean all of the screws now won’t stay in. They twist themselves out, the legs won’t stay on, the whole thing is falling apart. I’ve never seen anything like it and I’ve been building my own furniture my whole adult life. I tried to reach out about a replacement because I love it but I’ll be eating the money I guess, because it’s been ignored. I would go another route.
customer_reviews.author: Charli Bruce

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PURCHASE. It has completely fallen apart in 6+months. It has always been unstable, we never move it out of fear it will breal apart. Its heavy and has great storage, but that's it. Save your money, seriously. The assembly is cheap and the plywood YES, PLYWOOD broke off when I went to steam the rug underneath last night. And the first time moving ot sonce we put it together 6 minths ago. I tried flipping it upside down to try to reassemble, it just fell apart. The legs are the first things to get wobbly. JUST DON'T
customer_reviews.author: S. S. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you look at my profile, I have purchased a lot of Build it yourself furniture recently. This table gets five stars for the directions and Assembly! The manufacturers put everything in the box according to the assembly which is very nice! You do need a wrench (not included). I would definitely recommend this coffee table to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Boss girl

customer_reviews.title: Can't say how pleased I am with the product
customer_reviews.text: Can't say how pleased I am with the product!! I also bought the TV Stand and sidled tables all awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Justus

customer_reviews.title: We're happy with the quality / price.
customer_reviews.text: Very practical for our lifestyle. Discrete storage for salt, pepper, "medicines" and the rolling tray. The legs could be a little tighter fit. I'm afraid that if we're not careful moving it on the carpet it will eventually grow weak in the legs. I may add four extra screws. I'm pleased with the quality of the laminated wood grain to the particle board, it seems like it will be adequately resistant to tell-tale dings and scrapes.
customer_reviews.author: Troglodyte

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I really love this coffee table. The instructions and packaging were amazing - I really cannot stress helpful it is to have instructions this easy. The fittings and hardware all fit snug and are of higher quality. The height is just perfect for our cough too. I work from home periodically and it's nice to be able to hang out on the couch and work off of this coffee table. I put this together by myself in about an hour. The top with brackets was a little difficult alone but if you lay the coffee table down on it's side it makes it easier to attach the top brackets. Recommend this for anyone looking for a coffee table.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Heckman

customer_reviews.title: Junky hardware
customer_reviews.text: This table looked really nice while it was still together. Unfortunately the hardware is really crappy. The plastic cover on the hidden can screws are really junky and break easily. First the bottom shelf on mine collapsed and now the sides are being pushed from the top. I’m planning to take it all apart next weekend and reassemble it with my own hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonchica

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, I love the design and the way it looks. Unfortunately it is cheap wood. After only a few months of use the wood broke and the entire bottom part broke off. This was not from miss use but just normal every day use. We only put items under the recommended weight limit and it still broke. Looks great but is very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The table was flimsy and didn’t last. Having the storage is nice but it has serious stability. The bottom completely collapse and one of the legs has been loose since the beginning, even with a professional handyman assembly, and a second handyman trying to fix it. I’ve never had a sauder product that lasted. I don’t recommend purchasing anything from them.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: It quality is worth a lil bit more than 100 bucks, you get your money worth.
customer_reviews.text: I not going to say I absolutely love it bc there probably a better table out there, but it a good temporary fix for a broke college study on a budget. It not easy to assemble for a girl, but for a man maybe lol. The table has good qualities and it isn’t cheap fragile material. If you are delicate or take care of your stuff this should last you some time lol. It is awesome for eating while watching tv and doing late night studying. Just buy the dam thing picture are a thousand words, and not going to type it lol.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia

customer_reviews.title: easy  assemble
customer_reviews.text: took me about an hour to put together looks great easy to use if you have carpeting i would recommend sliders so when you move it the bottom dose not fall off like it did to me. the hidden cam dowel they get lose if you move had a little difficulty with hidden cam dowels i will need to get 4 small metal brackets to replace the cam dowel so i can make it a little more sturdy when i open top the bottom wont fall off . i do really love this table looks great . would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad piece of furniture.....
customer_reviews.text: Read most of the reviews and was wary about some, but, ordered anyway. Like it very much! Assembly up until the last 2 steps can be handled alone and is quite easy....if you follow the directions....and goes together well. Directions are not at all hard to follow and the little notes in the corner of the pages are intentionally amusing. Was not at all what some of the negative reviews l read about assembly and sturdiness. It ain't world class, top o' the line furniture, but, it is nice and functional and so far quite sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed. Not only was it a pain to put together but after a short while, it's falling apart. Cheap materials and not sturdy at all. I had to stop pulling the top up to use as the TV tray because the hinges were getting weak. One of the main reasons I paid so much for this coffee table was that particular feature. I will never buy another piece of furniture from this company.
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: Stella approved
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this coffee table is nice. The one negative thing I'll say is I din't realize it was made from particle board till it arrived and we started pulling it out to assemble. It doesn't look like it and does look like sold oak. It is pretty sturdy as well. It wasn't that bad to put together either. I nice afternoon with a cocktail and patience is all you need. I was also to find cute small baskets to put my dog's toys in that fit at the bottom of this table on Amazon. You can find them here if interested.
customer_reviews.author: Jsoroka

customer_reviews.title: Game-Changer
customer_reviews.text: This table is absolutely amazing for $150. It has a nice homey appearance, good quality (has a durable weight to it), and some great useful features (storage, lift top). Since assembling this (use two people), it has become the feature of our living room. Friends and family love it too. For the price I thought it would feel cheap and college dormy, but that is not the case at all. If you're looking to furnish the white house like a lot of these reviewers, then you should probably not shop for furniture online on Amazon. For a budget coffee table with awesome features, this is an amazing piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee table! It looks great! It does require some assembly time though. Not as much as ikea furniture, but it took me about an hour. One thing to beware of is that you can puncture the top layer, which sorta ruins it. My son dropped a piece of it when I was putting it together and that caused the screw to go clean through and chipped the oak looking top layer. We were able to glue it back on, but this is pretty typical of sauder furniture. It you want amazing quality you should definitely invest in a solid wood table.
customer_reviews.author: ViffaWeb

customer_reviews.title: Overall great product. Sturdy. Good size. But long installation and stiff top.
customer_reviews.text: Love this table! Just know it will take 2 hours to assemble. The joints are very stiff so you have to hold the table in place with your feet when you open and close the top...otherwise it moves the whole table. Not as much storage space as I expected. Otherwise we love it. We just use our feet to hold the table when we open and close it. Overall it is very sturdy and solid. Not cheaply made and it’s heavy which we like! The color also conceals dirt and crumbs which is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Sloan greer

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee table for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Took a bit to put together and some parts keep coming off no matter how hard I think I've screwed them in. Kind of hard to slide up and down but I guess it's good so it won't ever collapse on its own with my stuff on it. Ample space for storage and think the color looks nice. Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Francheska

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice when done
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice when done. Long time to assemble. Had a screw missing which I had to go to the hardware store to replace. Very cheap materials...all painted particle board.
customer_reviews.author: lu1975

customer_reviews.title: I love this table
customer_reviews.text: I love this table!! While assembly wasn't the easiest, two people did manage to put it together in one night. The table looks high quality and adds a nice, rustic feel to a room. Do not put hot items on the table because the finish will become damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: really sturdy, great quality
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't impressed with the wood planks themselves, as they look like typical boards with the faux wood finish you get form ikea furniture. However once put together, it's a really sturdy well built table. The mechanical arm to bring up the tabletop works great, we easily enjoy a 2-person meal on there in front of the tv without any wobbling. I haven't tested how much weight, but for daily use with my laptop to work and for meals, it's amazing. We use this more than our dining table now.
customer_reviews.author: Dang Vu

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the living room getting an end table next
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered a new coffee table figuring what the heck. So it arrived today I am a carpenter by trade. The instruction booklet was simple to read and follow the directions on the built of this table. The blister pack bolts and fasteners were also well marked. The whole process took around an hour to complete start to finish I really didnt time it so not sure really... but came out really nice heavy sturdy table for the price.... I highly recommend...
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Great table!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping which was awesome! I like the dark color finish. It is like the ikea particle board, but it seems pretty sturdy! Set up wasn’t too hard, I was scared at first because of how many pieces and hardware there was, but instructions were easy to follow and it ended up being not too hard. It has nice storage on the bottom shelves, the top lifts up for more storage which is a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Natalle

customer_reviews.title: Looks me fake and feels cheap... I guess that is what we paid for
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a piece of junk. I suspect it will be in a landfill before long. The lift top is terrible on it and the fake wood is very obviously fake looking. The TV stand is better but as they are a set this kills it for me. I will sink some screws in the lift top to make it fixed to avoid anyone using the poor quality lift... Wish my wife read the reviews better and we avoided this particular board POS. Don’t say I didn’t warn ya.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Sevem

customer_reviews.title: Meh, does the job
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice and was pretty easy to put together. However, it is still just thick particle board. Also, the cams didn't tighten the legs all the way so had to buy four long screws to secure the legs. The screws on the inside table mount rub the sides as the table is lifted up and down. Created large scratches on the side. The top scratches very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken table top.
customer_reviews.text: I like this coffee table, but after unboxing it and putting most of it together I noticed the top part of the coffee table had a cracked corner. It was not noticeable from the top, but underneath showed a crack all the way across the corner. Now that it’s mostly put together and I threw out the packaging I don’t think I can return it. Besides that it’s a solid table. I’m going to try fixing the corner with wood glue and hope it doesn’t break off completely. Otherwise I’ll be shopping for a new table and eating $150, otherwise I’d give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon Bish

customer_reviews.title: Good table for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little coffee/dinner table! Seems sturdy enough for my family of three to eat dinner on while we watch Stranger Things. The top does rise with some force, be careful there. It did take the better part of 6 or so hours for me to put together, it’s not difficult but a lot of steps. I was looking at a table like this from West Elm, but I’d rather spend 6 hours putting it together instead of paying the extra $500! Great purchase for the price!
customer_reviews.author: jackie k.

customer_reviews.title: Particle Board Junk!!!
customer_reviews.text: Keep looking for something else. I was able to put together ok but advise you NOT to buy. If you do make sure and glue everything together and use clamps.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey lee Wade

customer_reviews.title: Great table no complaints
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked at how heavy the table is! My daughter put it together for me in about 3 hours, while we talked and kidded around. The directions were very well written and even kind of humorous. Everything was there and lined up and was in perfect condition and the table turned out beautiful. Love it. I definately recommend this table if you are looking for a rustic look.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Thorn

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: The step by step instructions were great, it just takes a while. I suggest having a 2nd person to help after you get the first few pieces put together. It's beautiful and very well made. It held my hubby while he did tricep dips and didn't break even so it seems super sturdy! You can store items under the lift top, but I suggest getting baskets, same with the under storage areas. Books, board games or baskets for smaller items.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: great coffee table  - challenging assembly
customer_reviews.text: Harder to put together than your average piece of assemble yourself furniture, but it's a great coffee table. Great quality and super functional. I would estimate that it took about 2 hours to put together - and I'm very good at putting these sort of things together. Other than the challenging installation, this is really great. It looks really good, it's durable, and it's quite functional. I'm really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Suss

customer_reviews.title: Typical press board coffee table
customer_reviews.text: Not a terrible table but nothing impressive either. It lacks the rustic type panache it has is the product photos. Took about three hours to assemble and the spring mechanism to open the top seems pretty sub-par. The corners of the table are also really sharp, so if you have younger children you may not want this table.
customer_reviews.author: Blake P.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. In this case particle board covered in veneer, Assembly was easy.Have to tighten to locking devices every now and then. When you lift the top up it is the perfect height for the wife, but still a little short for me. Double check the dimensions, it's smaller in size then you realize.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny and Holly

customer_reviews.title: Its cheap and not built to last.
customer_reviews.text: The bolts are cheap. Move this thing with two people holding both sides , otherwise it just comes apart . Owned for less than 6 months and the seams of the top piece are already coming apart like ply wood soaking too much water . Gently moving this thing across some carpet caused the legs to disconnect and now the bolts won’t sit firmly inside . It’s cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.

customer_reviews.title: Love the storage space!
customer_reviews.text: This table is beautiful, expensive looking and sturdy. I particularly love the storage since I was constantly chasing remotes and video game controllers and chargers. The table top extending up is such a nice touch. My husband and I have had some great nights with a few snacks and beers, watching movies or playing video games without having to do sit-ups any time we wanted to sip a drink or grab some noshes.
customer_reviews.author: Fliberty-jibet

customer_reviews.title: Locking cams don’t lock in place.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this table for a redo of our TV room. It’s nice looking but the locking cams don’t lock. We’ve had to retighten them every week since we put the table together (Christmas eve). And it’s not like we’re dragging it across the floor which I’d expect to loosen it up. We will likely take it apart, put gorilla glue in the cams and put it back together and hope that helps.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Liking it more and more
customer_reviews.text: Liking this coffee table more everyday. Never had a pull up top before...wow...what took so long. Quality USA made table that is so stable. The top works smoothly even with drinks on it. Assembly was real easy especially if you are ambidextrous. Best instructs on assembly I ever saw. Took my time and had fun watching it become a nice looking table. Took well under an hour once I laid out the pieces. Like I said the best part is I like it more everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking table!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this table. Looks very expensive in my living room. Perfect height and size to fit in with my sectional. The only reason I did not give it a five, is I would have like it to be a bit heavier. It moves around a bit, especially when trying to open and close the top. Very nice piece of furniture for the price though!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but.......
customer_reviews.text: It looks great but the storage on top of coffee table is dumb at best. You can fit a good amount of things in the top, but you don't want to need anything you put in there because if you have anything on top it will go flying across the room. Its a spring loaded door, so as soon as you start to open it, it fly's open. The edge of the table are also very sharp and not just the corner's. I had to sand down the edge's to round it off some. It is also a average height for most couches' and looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: CutxThroatz

customer_reviews.title: Love this coffee table
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing coffee table that is sturdy and exactly the color that I expected. Love the flip up top extention. Great for eating dinner in front of the TV. You have to put it together and as long as you can read the instructions the assembly is easy. I ordered the side table and console table for under my tv to match and can hardly eat to get them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this table!
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to assemble, sturday and a must if you spend long hours reading or tudying on a couch...it comes right to you. I always had a problem with where to put my myriad of books and music...problem solved. Love the distressed wood color as well
customer_reviews.author: ZZ Mop

customer_reviews.title: falls apart very easily
customer_reviews.text: We bought this item considering the low price. The item came very well packaged and assembling was a lil tricky with the lift top. It is fit for you if it is left in a place. If you need the table to be moved frequently (we have a sleeper sofa and we move the table front and back frequently to adjust the spacing), then this is not suitable. Usually there is a lock to keep the table from falling apart, this item does not have one. After a week or so, it has started to fall apart. I would have returned it if it was not so tricky to disassemble. Now we are too lazy!
customer_reviews.author: ~AP

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected it to be!
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly what I expected! I use the raised top every day. From reading the paper to doing my crossword puzzles, the convinence of having a raised top makes it easy just do do those things and even have a snack or meal also. Love the table also for its sturdiness. It’s as if I bought it instead of putting it together which I found very easy!
customer_reviews.author: Neyney

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: The pieces aren't built evenly. When finished, no matter what I do, the side bottom legs are loose. Took it apart several times to see if I did it wrong. Nope. It's cute but I wish it was more even and the ends stayed put. Advice? Would not recommend at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Panida

customer_reviews.title: A little small but nice
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than we thought it would be but we love it. It matches the other pieces we have bought and the lift top has been sturdy enough to use with a laptop so that was a plus. We store a couple of small blankets in it as well. The color matches the bookcase we purchased from Sauder too.
customer_reviews.author: RC311

customer_reviews.title: Top doesn’t lay flat with table base
customer_reviews.text: The product is as expected for a cheaper table but the top doesn’t lay flat against the table (it floats 1/4 inch on the right and 1/2 inch on the left above the base of the table) the hinges are screwed into the pre-drilled holes and are flush with the inside of the storage cabinet floor. It’s the hinges themselves that are too tall for the storage space. You don’t notice it much from looking down at the table but it is noticeable from the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Pintsized Chick

customer_reviews.title: Nice Table :)
customer_reviews.text: I really love this table! I bought it to use along with our couch in the basement so that it can transition to an eating surface. Benefits: There are a lot of steps/time consuming but assembly is easy to follow. The table feels really solid and looks nice. The opening feature feels sturdy and the transition into the open position moves smoothly. The only downside I noticed: The surface top surface scratches relatively easily. It has been used lightly (no kids in the home) and has a couple marks that won’t go away. I think a touch up pen may fix this (?)
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Nice coffee table piece
customer_reviews.text: Assembly is not bad but much easier with two people. It is fairly sturdy and supports a decent amount of weight when you lift the top piece up. In terms of look, it looks great and the rustic-wood look is awesome. I did have a wood crack on the top piece when I got it, but Sauder immediately sent a new top once I called. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: George Nassar

customer_reviews.title: Great Table
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult to assemble (because I kept putting the pieces on upside down), but once I got it together I was impressed. Even when lifted up the table seems to hold a decent amount of weight. In my opinion, well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality furniture
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased along with the end tables. It took almost 2 hours to assemble but all the mechansims work and the top lifts very smoothly. We tend to eat while on the sofa watching TV so this table offered a perfect solution, as the height when extended is perfect for placing our plates on. Quality is great on this for the price and we just ordered the matching TV stand with the fireplace conversion kit to go in the center. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Stanley

customer_reviews.title: assembly hardware will burst through sides due to weight of table
customer_reviews.text: This table is beautiful, however, the sides are not made of solid wood leaving the hardware to burst through the sides. As much as I would love more pieces because of the look of the furniture (and it is heavy) unfortunately, too heavy to hold up under weight of table. I was saddened it fell apart at both sides - with no weight on the table.
customer_reviews.author: Bren

customer_reviews.title: Functional, sturdy, and ample storage space
customer_reviews.text: This coffee table has been perfect. I have to work remotely a lot and it makes sitting on the couch with my laptop super convenient. I have my own “couch desk”. It’s useful because I can store books, electronics, etc inside the opening of the table and there also ample room on the shelves beneath it. Very easy to clean and doesn’t seem to scratch easily around my 3yo.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: My son and his GF love this!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this versatile table for our son & his GF who was just moving in with him. They're thrilled with it. I have yet to lay eyes on it, but Offspring is highly knowledgeable and somewhat critical, so if he gives it thumbs up that's enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Negril Jerry

customer_reviews.title: This coffee table is beyond beautiful and once I had it put together
customer_reviews.text: This coffee table is beyond beautiful and once I had it put together, is solid and the top expandable piece is just perfect!! I work from home on my laptop. I can sit on my couch and lift the top up and it works as a second office!!! Do not hesitate in this purchase. I wish all our furniture was this amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Shops with Joy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy enough for me.
customer_reviews.text: I like this thing. It was a hassle to assemble, like all complex, hinged RTA furniture is. I can have my stamp reference books, laptop and other stuff on it while it's open with absolutely no problem. I even had a guest sit on it for a few minutes (while I cringed) and it didn't cave. So I'd imagine it will last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great looking table! Functional. I question longevity of the hardware.
customer_reviews.text: I love this table! Looks great and good storage. I wish the metal hardware felt more solid. So far no issues, but I’m very careful lifting and lowering the top because I feel like it could easily fail. That’s the only reason I didn’t give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Dodi

customer_reviews.title: not durable
customer_reviews.text: This table looks great and functions wonderfully for storage. However, with minor weight on the bottom shelf (a few books and blankets), it tore out of the particle wood within a couple months. We have to get rid of the table now because our dog keeps chewing at the areas where the screws broke through. Wish this was made out of solid wood, the design is great, but not durable.
customer_reviews.author: ADB

customer_reviews.title: This could be one of the best thing I bought from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This could be one of the best thing I bought from Amazon! Pros: - Looks great - Good material. Heavy wood, doesn't have the Ikea cheap feel - Lift up top is super convenient Cons: - Haven't found one yet but I'm a little worry about the lift up top because I use it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Chris P.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it! The lift top is very strong and ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! The lift top is very strong and actually stays up when you are doing stuff on it. It looks very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: The legs fell off
customer_reviews.text: The legs fell off because they are held on with joint connector nuts. The wood fiber/Composite end facings will not support the weight of a table under a normal load + 25 pounds and some laminate dehiscence occurred after three months of use. I used multiple 6 inch drywall screws to hold it together. I will now cannibalize this piece’s topface metal hardware to create the coffee table the way it should be done.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy ...costly construction for poor quality item.
customer_reviews.text: The assembly of this item cost me almost $75 dollars. The carpenter found it very time consuming and needed to purchase a special tool for the job. The "wood" has the appearance of fake plastic consistency. Not worth the price. ..
customer_reviews.author: STAR 91

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: The table arrived in rough shape. The box was torn open in a few places and there are plenty of dings because of it. We decided it would be a way bigger pain in the butt to return it, so we put it together and the dings aren’t super noticeable anymore. It’s fine. The top works well, and there was a lot of cursing, but we got it assembled in about an hour. It’s made out of plywood which is disappointing. All in all, big old OK. Not great, but not that bad.
customer_reviews.author: A.N.Y.

customer_reviews.title: How do we get our money back?????
customer_reviews.text: Thus product was hard to put together but followed all directions. It looked great. It did not hold up one day. We woke up to a crash. The legs Fell off and just busted through table. Nothing on it. No one near it. It’s just a bad leg design. Bought other cabinets and they are great. This is a great design but just junk. No quality in legs.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S. Vogelhuber

customer_reviews.title: Hard work but worth it
customer_reviews.text: It took us a little less than 2 hours to build this which was annoying but we are very pleased with the result. It says that you need a hammer however you do not its just to put covers over the hidden cams and screws so they look natural just use the back of a screwdriver. The instructions are clear and easy to follow, a good purchase. The mechanism for opening and closing the hidden compartment is smooth. I would build this with another person you need 4 hands.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Borachi

customer_reviews.title: Bottom broke from the weight of my foot.
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed! My husband and I loved the way this table looked and how it had a open top for storage; however, the bottom was not sturdy at all. Because its particle board and there is such little support (two little anchoring screws) it couldn't even hold the weight of me gently resting my foot on it while sitting. And I am not a big person (5'4" 125lbs)!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Durflinger

customer_reviews.title: Great table! Decent quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee table. I really do! The color, storage, and lift up table top is perfect for me! Working on the computer from home, this makes sitting on the couch and working so much easier and comfier! But.... This table is not sturdy! The legs pop out of the table, every time you try to move it! No sliding this table! Be very very careful if you want to move it. I’ve had this table for almost 8 months now, and the bottom shelf has completely fallen off! All in all, this is a great piece of furniture for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: amazing for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Slightly different shade than the picture, but I was hoping it would be this shade so I am super pleased. Pain in the ass to assemble, but it’s worth it! You really have to hold onto the table tight when lifting it or lowering it because if you have drinks on there’s they will go flying when it pops up. Super happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Sydcratsenberg

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition.
customer_reviews.text: I love the table. Guests are always blown away when I lift the lid. The assembly is pretty rough and time consuming. It took 2 people about 90 minutes from start to finish. It was worth it to me because I wasn't one of the 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: dave14

customer_reviews.title: Awesome design, very conveinient
customer_reviews.text: Great product with an awesome design. I was able to assemble most of it by myself, but at the very last step I would recommend a partner. Perfect for eating meals or using a laptop while watching tv, and plenty of storage space. Also, it's a great place to cut cocaine! I would imagine. I'm not too sure because I don't believe in doing drugs, I prefer vodka. But for those that do, I'm thinking this table is perfect for you too!
customer_reviews.author: Thompson, H. S.

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Junk! Got the table when I opened the box, one of the pieces was broken. Sauder did send me a new one after a few days. Put the table together and within days it broke, in two places the screws go in. . I am trying to put it back together with Gorilla Wood glue all though I don’t think it will work. Guess I’ll put it out to the road with the trash, and go to the store to buy a real table. So disappointed, as I have other Sauder pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Good table
customer_reviews.text: So, everything about this table I love. It looks even better in person. Only thing I take away is the fact that the legs tend to lean apart from the table if you move it. It was a simple fix by applying wood glue to the inside of each leg.
customer_reviews.author: dayna noonan

customer_reviews.title: Functional and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: We love this coffee table. The color is perfect and matches the photo, and it opens and closes very smoothly. The table is durable, beautiful, and functional. We purchased the matching end tables and loved those as well.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Solid Table
customer_reviews.text: I've had this table set up for about a month. We love it. It wasn't all that difficult to put together but we're used to IKEA type assembly. Just go slow, read ALL of the instructions and you'll be ok. We like how solid it feels even though I wouldn't sit on it as the top kinda bows a little under a person's weight. It doesn't feel like a cheap piece of furniture and the top glides up and down easily. All in all, we love our new table.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie L Laurence

product_meta.title: Sauder Dakota Pass Lift-Top Coffee Table | Craftsman Oak Finish | model
product_meta.description:
Color:Craftsman Oak Finish

Redefine your living space with this unique lift-top coffee table from the Dakota Pass collection. The top lifts up and forward creating a multipurpose work surface so you can work from home, surf the web, or eat a snack while relaxing on your couch. Other features include open shelves and hidden storage beneath the top for storing blankets, board games and more! Finished on all sides in rustic Craftsman Oak, this versatile coffee table adds style and function to your home.

Interior Space under the Lift Top is 5 1/8 high x 33 1/8 Inches wide (spring to spring) x 14 3/4 Inches deep
Top measures 23 5/8 Inches high when open and extends 10 1/2 Inches deeper,Lower openings measure 6 1/8 Inches high x 17 3/8 Inches wide x 17 5/8 Inches deep
feature_bullets: Your purchase includes One Sauder Dakota Pass Lift-Top Coffee Table in Craftsman Oak Finish
Coffee table dimensions – 43 1/8” W x 19 ½” D x 19” H | Top Height measurement – 23 5/8” | Please refer to product pictures for a better view of table’s dimensions
Open shelves for storage and display. Finished on all sides for versatile placement
Table is built from an engineered wood with a paper laminate finish. No outdoor use or re-painting is recommended as it may damage product’s structure

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,331 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
